content:
# The harvesting of 10 units of iron ore was successful, and my inventory now shows 20 units of iron ore and 15 units of coal. This is a positive outcome as it allows me to proceed with crafting processes.

# Given the previous issues with placing the stone furnace, I will now attempt to craft a stone furnace using the iron ore and coal I have collected.

# Attempting to craft a stone furnace.
craft_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)  # Crafting one stone furnace.
print(f"Crafting result: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after crafting.
